thread.title: Very Good Hotel Excellent Location
thread.title_full: Very Good Hotel Excellent Location - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: RonanOSullivan
title: Very Good Hotel Excellent Location
text: This is a very good hotel which is just up from Times Square. So all around Times Square is walking distance. Noise in the hotel was not an issue and being so central didnt affect us getting any sleep either. We booked about 3 months in advance and did really well on the hotel price that way so I was very happy with it. The room is nice and while we werent overlooking time square we had a nice view of NY..
